verses.verse: <S%H575>How<s%> <S%H5704>long,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> will I <S%H7768>call<s%> for <S%H7768>help,<s%> And Thou wilt not <S%H8085>hear<s%>? I <S%H2199>cry<s%> out to Thee, <S%H2555>"Violence!<s%>" Yet Thou dost not <S%H3467>save.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> dost Thou <S%H7200>make<s%> me <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> And cause [me] to <S%H5027>look<s%> on <S%H5999>wickedness<s%>? Yes, <S%H7701>destruction<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%> are <S%H5048>before<s%> me; <S%H7379>Strife<s%> <S%H1961>exists<s%> and <S%H4066>contention<s%> <S%H5375>arises.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H6313>ignored<s%> And <S%H4941>justice<s%> is <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> <S%H3318>upheld.<s%> For the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3803>surround<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> out <S%H6127>perverted.<s%>

<S%H7200>"Look<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations!<s%> <S%H5027>Observe!<s%> Be <S%H8539>astonished!<s%> <S%H8539>Wonder!<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> [I] am <S%H6466>doing<s%> <S%H6467>something<s%> in your <S%H3117>days<s%> â€“ You would not <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> you were <S%H5608>told.<s%>

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H6965>raising<s%> up the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> That <S%H4751>fierce<s%> and <S%H4116>impetuous<s%> <S%H1471>people<s%> Who <S%H1980>march<s%> <S%H4800>throughout<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> To <S%H3423>seize<s%> <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>places<s%> which are not theirs.
"They are <S%H366>dreaded<s%> and <S%H3372>feared.<s%> Their <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H7613>authority<s%> <S%H3318>originate<s%> with themselves.

"Their <S%H5483>horses<s%> are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H5246>leopards<s%> And <S%H2300>keener<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H2061>wolves<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening.<s%> Their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6335>galloping,<s%> Their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>afar;<s%> They <S%H5774>fly<s%> like an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H2363>swooping<s%> [down] to <S%H398>devour.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> of them <S%H935>come<s%> for <S%H2555>violence.<s%> Their <S%H4041>horde<s%> of <S%H6440>faces<s%> [moves] <S%H6921>forward.<s%> They <S%H622>collect<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%> like <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

"They <S%H7046>mock<s%> at <S%H4428>kings,<s%> And <S%H7336>rulers<s%> are a <S%H4890>laughing<s%> matter to them. They <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4013>fortress,<s%> And <S%H6651>heap<s%> up <S%H6083>rubble<s%> to <S%H3920>capture<s%> it.

<S%H227>"Then<s%> they will <S%H2498>sweep<s%> <S%H2498>through<s%> [like] the <S%H7307>wind<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> on. But they will be <S%H816>held<s%> <S%H816>guilty,<s%> They <S%H2098>whose<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> is their <S%H433>god.<s%>"

Art Thou not from <S%H6924>everlasting,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%>? We will not <S%H4191>die.<s%> Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> hast <S%H7760>appointed<s%> them to <S%H4941>judge;<s%> And Thou, O <S%H6697>Rock,<s%> hast <S%H3245>established<s%> them to <S%H3198>correct.<s%>

[Thine] <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H2889>pure<s%> to <S%H7200>approve<s%> <S%H9563>evil,<s%> And Thou <S%H3201>canst<s%> not <S%H5027>look<s%> on <S%H5999>wickedness<s%> [with favor.] <S%H4100>Why<s%> dost Thou <S%H5027>look<s%> with favor On those who <S%H898>deal<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%>? Why art Thou <S%H2790>silent<s%> when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>swallow<s%> up Those <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> they?

[Why] hast Thou <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> like the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> Like <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>things<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> a <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over them?

[The Chaldeans] <S%H5927>bring<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them up with a <S%H2443>hook,<s%> <S%H1641>Drag<s%> them <S%H1641>away<s%> with their <S%H2764>net,<s%> And <S%H622>gather<s%> them together in their <S%H4365>fishing<s%> <S%H4365>net.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> and are <S%H1523>glad.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to their <S%H2764>net.<s%> And <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to their <S%H4365>fishing<s%> <S%H4365>net;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> through <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H1992>things<s%> their <S%H2506>catch<s%> is <S%H8082>large,<s%> And their <S%H3978>food<s%> is <S%H1277>plentiful.<s%>
